channel.title: I cant make myself admin/mod/update my stats. I can get on though
channel.description:
I can get on my server with Localhost. Nobody else can get on my server. If I make myself rights:2 or 3.... It says I have them. But I don't. If I update my levels.. It doesnt appear as them in game. If I train in the server, like get my levels up, they do log and can be shown in the characters log.
My server logs what I do...
But I cant control the levels and everything.

item.title: I cant make myself admin/mod/update my stats. I can get on though
item.dc:creator: @silly_faggit silly_faggit
item.description:
@silly_faggit wrote:

Yea. I compile everytime. It still wont work…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2007, 04:55:22 PM[/size][hr]I still cant be admin though. It stinks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2007, 05:12:39 PM[/size][hr]I still cant get this to work though. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2007, 05:24:41 PM[/size][hr]Will someone please help?

Read full topic

item.title: I cant make myself admin/mod/update my stats. I can get on though
item.dc:creator: @silly_faggit silly_faggit
item.description:
@silly_faggit wrote:

I dont want others to go on it yet…

I want to get the admin and owner and mod status working first.

If I cant be an admin, And I have my own server… That will suck…
People can spam it all up and I cant ban them… That wont help…

The rights thing isnt working right…

Read full topic

item.title: I cant make myself admin/mod/update my stats. I can get on though
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

u need ur own ip to let ppl on, lol…

and 2nd if u HAD ur own it should work…

to get ur ip, use these steps:
start>>>run>>>type in cmd>>>type in ipconfig>>>it will tell u ip: (ip here)

that should do it.

go to no-ip.com to get ur no-ip too.

Read full topic
